scripts.install: npm --prefix types install && npm --prefix server install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix client install  --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix client run start" "npm --prefix server run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix client run lint && npm --prefix server run lint
